attributes.action: exclude unelected Lords and Baronesses from Government posts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are currently some 25 members of the Government who are not elected MPs, including Lords Mandelson, Adonis and Drayson and Baronesses Scotland, Vadera and Kinnock. The giving of legislative powers to unelected persons makes it quite clear that this country is a Parliamentary Monarchy and not a Democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
